data.oai_dc:dc: Seatrout (Salmo trutta L.) population structure after 125 years of stocking using Single Nucleotide Polymorphism (SNP) markers

540 genetic samples of seatrout of different age classes from 24 North German rivers have been analyzed using 180 SNPs. The data contain measurement data from each individual and selected information about the sampling locations. In addition, SNP genotyping results for each marker and individuum are provided.
